text: IT TIME ACADEMY is one of the largest and most trusted programming schools in Uzbekistan. Since 2017, we have been providing quality education in modern IT professions to thousands of young people. Our goal is not only to teach programming but also to prepare each student for a successful future career. We pay special attention to the individual development of each student and use modern teaching methods.
